384x384.quote: ViT-L/16, p 16, fold 0/5, res 384, x x x, bi-tempered, 7, 1e-4, cosine anl, AdamW, 19 + 20

centercrop.quote: Simply using CenterCrop + horizontal & vertical flop achieves better CV & LB scores.

cutmix.quote: Augmentations : FMix, CutMix, SnapMix, MixUp, Cutout, etc...

cutout.quote: Augmentations : FMix, CutMix, SnapMix, MixUp, Cutout, etc...

flip.quote: Simply using CenterCrop + horizontal & vertical flop achieves better CV & LB scores.

fmix.quote: Augmentations : FMix, CutMix, SnapMix, MixUp, Cutout, etc...

horizontalflip.quote: Simply using CenterCrop + horizontal & vertical flop achieves better CV & LB scores.

mixup.quote: Augmentations : FMix, CutMix, SnapMix, MixUp, Cutout, etc...

snapmix.quote: Augmentations : FMix, CutMix, SnapMix, MixUp, Cutout, etc...

verticalflip.quote: Simply using CenterCrop + horizontal & vertical flop achieves better CV & LB scores.

deit-b/16.quote: I tried 6 models (ResNeSt50, ResNeSt50 4s2x40d, EffNet-B3, 4, ViT-L/16, DeiT-B/16)

efficientnet-b3.quote: I tried 6 models (ResNeSt50, ResNeSt50 4s2x40d, EffNet-B3, 4, ViT-L/16, DeiT-B/16) and decided to use ResNeSt50 4s2x40d, EffNet-B4 based on LB & CV scores... EfficientNet-B3 NS (tta4) 0.895 0.896 0.895

efficientnet-b4.quote: decided to use ResNeSt50 4s2x40d, EffNet-B4 based on LB & CV scores... EfficientNet-B4 NS (tta4) 0.891 0.900 0.893

resnest50.quote: I tried 6 models (ResNeSt50, ResNeSt50 4s2x40d, EffNet-B3, 4, ViT-L/16, DeiT-B/16)

resnest50-fast-4s2x40d.quote: decided to use ResNeSt50 4s2x40d, EffNet-B4 based on LB & CV scores. ResNeSt50-fast-4s2x40d (tta4) 0.891 0.898 0.895

vit-l/16.quote: I tried 6 models (ResNeSt50, ResNeSt50 4s2x40d, EffNet-B3, 4, ViT-L/16, DeiT-B/16)

imagenet.quote: I tried 6 models (ResNeSt50, ResNeSt50 4s2x40d, EffNet-B3, 4, ViT-L/16, DeiT-B/16) and decided to use ResNeSt50 4s2x40d, EffNet-B4 based on LB & CV scores

bi-tempered-logistic-loss.quote: Loss : focal cosine, cross-entropy w/ label smoothing, bi-tempered

cross-entropy-with-label-smoothing.quote: I chose to use focal cosine loss & cross-entropy w/ label smoothing 0.2... Loss : focal cosine, cross-entropy w/ label smoothing, bi-tempered

focal-cosine.quote: I chose to use focal cosine loss & cross-entropy w/ label smoothing 0.2. EfficientNet-B4 NS (tta3) focal cosine 0.890 0.900 0.895

learning_rate.quote: Scheduler : Cosine Anealling w/o warm-up (1e-4 to 1e-6)

cosine-annealing.quote: Scheduler : Cosine Anealling w/o warm-up (1e-4 to 1e-6)

pseudo-labeling.quote: the pseudo label boosts the CV score +0.007. (I generated a pseudo label based on my best CV score, 0.9051)

2019-data.quote: Data : 2019 + 2020 datasets, only 2020, w/ pseudo labels... external dataset (2019 dataset)

2020-data.quote: Data : 2019 + 2020 datasets, only 2020, w/ pseudo labels

simple-averaging-ensemble.quote: Ensembles, Weights, Single model's CV & LB scores seem not good, But, ensembling raises the CV & LB scores to 0.005.

weighted-ensemble.quote: I tuned the ensemble weights with Optuna & Simple on CV... Ensembles 9 weights : [0.33547759, 0.30181755, 0.28914882]

pytorch.quote: I only got Kaggle GPU, so I couldn't experiment with many models with various recipes.
